name: 陳世楷
objective: 隨著台灣農工型態的轉變以及越來越高的生活品質要求,地下水所扮演的角將日益重要,地下水的領域涵蓋水量,水質及防災三方面,修習此一學科,可以了解地下水水文及水力學之基本原理,進而掌握地下水水理與污染傳輸之特性,以作為規劃與管理地下水資源之依據.
schedule:
週次	授課內容
1	Introduction
2	Hydrologic Processes
3	Basic Principles of Ground-Water Flow
4~5	Basic Principles of Ground-Water Flow
6	Theory of Ground-Water Flow in Unsaturated Zone 
7	Groundwater Levels and Environmental Influences
8	Response of Confined Aquifers to Pumping 
9	期中考 (35%)
10~11	Artificial Recharge of Groundwater
12	Saline Water Intrusion in Aquifer
13	Superposition theory
14~15	Basics of Transport, Advection, and Dispersion 
16~17	Ground water sampling and contamination control
18	期末考 (35%)
materials:
教科書：
(1) Franklin W. Schwartz ; Fundamentals of Ground Water
(2). Tood, D.K., 1959. Groundwater Hydrology, John Wiley & Sons Inc.
(3). Freeze, R.A. and J.A. Cherry, 1979. Groundwater, Prentice-Hall, Inc. Englewood Cliffs, New Jersey 07632.
(4) 曹以松：地下水,中國土木水利工程學會
